Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory268.png'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'This ring-shaped underground facility consists of different sectors that serve different purposes, including the Living Area, the Armament Area, and the Industrial Area.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'All of them were built encircling the Core Area, and from what the blueprint told us, each of them consists of a pathway to the Core.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We've entered through Area B, which is designated as the Industrial Area.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The underground center of the Core Area is in charge of all the operations in this facility, including power, production, defense, and signal disguises...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Huaxu is probably in the Core Area.', 3: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Then the question now is how do we get there.', 4: '1'}

{3: "Following Lucia's gaze, you find the Industrial Area in front of you obstructed by multiple platforms, each requiring unlocking a connecting passage before you can reach the bridge that takes you to the Core."}
{2: 'Lee, any thoughts?', 3: '15'}
{3: 'Lee does not answer. Instead, he tries to activate the operation console on the platform.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Of course it doesn't work. It requires a special identification for platform management.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'We can always try to brute force the decryption, but that will cost us a lot of time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Huaxu's message might be gibberish, but it was sent adhering to Babylonia's guide on rescue requests on the emergency frequency. It can't be a coincidence.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "If the message was a clue left for us, and it was unauthorized by Luna, having not heard from Huaxu for such a long time means Luna has discovered what's going on.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "...We're running out of time.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: 'Lee, Commandant, please listen to me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'If we use the Spear of F.O.S. to examine the access history of these operation consoles, maybe we can find a way to open the passages.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Asimov never mentioned that it's capable of that.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Murray', 3: "It's a restricted function only available to the highest clearance level, but I'm unlocking it for you temporarily.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You have the highest clearance level?', 3: '34'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: "Ugh... As my brother said, this isn't time for protocols. I'm sure Hassen will understand.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Murray', 3: 'Just leave it to me.', 4: '1'}
